suggestedTasks.title: Audit and Standardize Agent Naming Across Codebase
suggestedTasks.description: Perform a comprehensive review of all existing agent naming conventions in the codebase. Ensure consistent implementation of the new jat-<project>-<agentName> format across all components, configuration files, and documentation. This will require a systematic search and replace operation and careful validation of all affected systems.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure full consistency in the new agent naming convention

suggestedTasks.title: Create Naming Convention Documentation
suggestedTasks.description: Develop clear documentation explaining the new agent naming convention, including rationale, format, and guidelines for future implementation. Include examples and best practices for naming agents across different project types and contexts.
suggestedTasks.reason: Provide clear guidance for developers on new naming standard
